class openzwave.value.ZWaveValue(value_id, network=None, parent_id=None, command_class=0)

Represents a single value. Must be updated to use the cachedObject facilities.

check_data()

Check that data is correct for this value. Must be called

Returns:The valid values
Return type:set()
command_class

The commandclass of the value.

Return type:int
data

The current data of the value.

Return type:depending of the type of the value
data_as_string

The value data as String.

Return type:str
data_items

When type of value is list, data_items contains a list of valid values

Returns:The valid values
Return type:set()
disable_poll(intensity)

Disable poll off this value.

Return type:bool
enable_poll(intensity)

Enable poll off this value.

Return type:bool
genre

The genre of the value.

Returns:genre of the value
Return type:str
help

The help of the value.

Return type:str
is_polled

Verify that the value is polled.

Return type:bool
is_read_only

Test whether the value is read-only.

Returns:True if the value cannot be changed by the user.
Return type:bool
is_set

Test whether the value has been set.

Returns:True if the value has actually been set by a status message

from the device, rather than simply being the default. :rtype: bool

is_write_only

Test whether the value is write-only.

Returns:True if the value can only be written to and not read.
Return type:bool
label

The label of the value.

Return type:str
max

The max of the value.

Return type:int
min

The min of the value.

Return type:int
parent_id

The parent_id of the value.

type

The type of the value.

Returns:type of the value
Return type:str
units

The units of the value.

Return type:str
value_id

The value_id of the value.
